dcterms:description: Mini-Kinetics comprises 200 action categories and contains 121K videos for training and 10K videos for testing, with each video lasting 6-10 seconds.
dcterms:title: Mini-Kinetics

dcterms:creator: Fabian Caba Heilbron
Victor Escorcia
Bernard Ghanem
Juan Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: ActivityNet-v1.3 is a widely used video dataset for multi-label action recognition tasks, including 200 human activity categories, with 10,024 training videos and 4,926 validation videos.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet-v1.3
